name: Race Trace
description:
Race Trace is a humorous chair race game prototype where you play as one of office workers. It is friday night and everyone dreams to finally get to the bar and drink a few bottles of beer. Hurry up! The first one at the bar gets a six-pack for free! 

Controls:

  • Use WASD to control the chair
  • Press Space to brake

Created by Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4

Credits:

  • Soundtrack by LITTLE BIG — I'M OK
  • Blue Man Vehicle AI Plugin by Blue man
  • CHAIR 3D Model by adityajaiswal9968 
  • Office Chair3D Model by j.a.m
  • Scientist Low Back Office Chair Bk & Gd - 1010173D Model by Zuo Modern
  • POLYGON - Town Pack by Synty Studios
